'''''Middle-earth Role Playing: a complete system for adventuring in J.R.R. Tolkien's World''''' was a core rulebook for ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'', 1st Edition. It was later replaced by a [[Middle-earth Role Playing: The Role Playing Game of J.R.R. Tolkien's World|second rulebook using the same stocknumber]] (1986) and the ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing (2nd edition)|Middle-earth Role Playing, 2nd ed.]]'' (1993).
